RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Cells!
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description:
Clip based live performance tool incorporating a number of advanced features including:
* Granular timestretching * Slice based timestretching * MultiFX box * Support for multiple audio outputs * Bidirectional controller framework * Network based multiplayer jamming
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: Martin Bealby | mxb (mbealby@gmail.com)
